head.supplied: 27/7/96. ¶ ¶ By this mail of the week, dear Prof Milne-Edwards, I send a small case with some few eggs of ¶ rare ¶ birds of North-Eastern Australia. I hope to have by the French Mail-Steamer an oth...

div.p: MS 2474, f. 566, Bibliothèque Centrale du Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, Paris.

By this mail of the week, dear Prof Milne-Edwards, I send a small case with some few eggs of rare birds of North-Eastern Australia. I hope to have by the French Mail-Steamer an other case ready, but am not certain yet, as some Minerals, which I expected, have not yet arrived. In the case will be also a parcel of my works, so far as they were yet obtainable for the Library of the Institut. I have not yet heard from Prof. Lacroix, whether the last minerals proved of Interest to his collection in the Galleries of your great [museum]
Let me hope that you are happy and well
